__guestbook_email__: Your E-Mail (It will not be displayed)
__guestbook_email_hidden__: Only you, as a page administrator, can see this email
__guestbook_email_newmessage_text__: You have a new guestbook message. Goto {url} to review and enable this entry.
__guestbook_emailconfig_missing__: You must configure your email settings in the backend to be able to receive emails on new entries.
__guestbook_module_info__: Provide your user a way to communicate with you. Everybody can write in a guestbook and everyone can read guestbook messages.
__guestbook_pageblocks_guestbook_desc__: Provide your user a way to communicate with you. Everybody can write in a guestbook and everyone can read guestbook messages.
__guestbook_pageblocks_guestbook_emailne: Send you an e-mail to the given address on a new guestbook entry
__guestbook_saved_draft__: Thank you for your message. After it has been reviewed, it will be showed on this page.
